Both my late father and my brother were time served fitters and turners. My father was crippled by profound osteoarthritis in the 60s and had to be retrained as an engineer draftsman. My brother was made redundant in the 80s so went back to school to get his HND (a diploma here in the U.K., I’m not sure if it still exist), degree, masters and PhD in engineering. I became a chef so I was ignorant of the skills they possessed.

I think your skills are amazing, you create things that blow my mind and especially so here where you demonstrate your manual skills. I also owe you a thank you you might not understand, but watching your videos I feel I know my late father better and what he might have been capable of at one point in his life. You make me very proud of both Dad and my brother.
